name: Drugging
description: How experienced you are at using and creating drugs.

name: Healing
description: How well you can heal yourself and others.

name: Barter
description: How well you can haggle with others and secure better prices and rewards.

name: Fighting
description: How well you can fight with melee weapons.

name: Seduction
description: How skilled you are at arousing others and convincing them to have sex with you.

name: Fucking
description: How well you can please a partner sexually.

name: Grappling
description: How well you can grab, hold, and throw an enemy.

name: Punching
description: How well you can fight in hand-to-hand combat.

name: Running
description: How far and fast you can run, to flee combat or travel quickly.

name: Sneaking
description: How well you can evade detection, pick pockets, avoid combat, and generally go unnoticed.
